page.title: 10The People of Bridgerule
page.content: The people of Bridgerule lead a relatively quiet and peaceful life enjoying the friendship and company of each other. Most families own a car and are able to enjoy a day out to the cities of Exeter and Plymouth which are both approximately an hour's drive away. For those who do not own a car there is a regular daily bus service to Bude and Holsworthy. The villagers have several sporting teams including badminton, skittles (men and women), football and cricket. There is a local clay pigeon shoot and many locals are keen anglers. There is also a thriving WI, a youth club and an amateur theatrical society. The local schoolchildren also provide entertainment regularly throughout the year.
